HTMLVideoElementVideoHeight.summary:
The interface's read-only videoHeight property indicates the intrinsic height of the video, expressed in CSS pixels.
In simple terms, this is the height of the media in its natural size.
HTMLVideoElementVideoHeight.value:
An integer value specifying the intrinsic height of the video in CSS pixels.
If the element's is HTMLMediaElement.HAVE_NOTHING, then the value of this property is 0, because neither video nor poster frame size information is yet available.
